metadata.synopsis: Volo, a reknowned scholar, has been captured by goblins and is being forced to sing on a stage at their celebratory party following a raid. One goblin has the responsibility of guarding him and engages him in conversation. If the goblins are killed, he investigates the corpses, researching the cause of death.

41.speaker: Volo
41.text:
With fragulous crown, and with sceptre abrade,
Dror Ragzlin short work of the innkeeper made!
41.context: NodeContext: singing improvised nonsense under duress, projecting his voice. 'fragulous' has a hard 'g' to sound somewhat like 'fabulous'. 'abrade' is pronounced a-braid. Dror Ragzlin is 'Drawer RAGS-lin'

38.speaker: Volo
38.text:
The inn burned to ash! The captives were many!
Goblinkind had reduced them to cowering filfenny!
38.context: NodeContext: singing improvised nonsense under duress, projecting his voice. 'filfenny' pronounced 'filth-any'

56.speaker: Volo
56.text:
So raiseth your goblets, and drain them with pride!
Dror Ragzlin, the True Soul, hath led you galide!
56.context: NodeContext: singing improvised nonsense under duress, projecting his voice. 'Dror Ragzlin' is the goblins' leader (pronounced 'Drawer RAGS-lin'), 'galide' is a nonsense word pronounced with a hard 'g' (Gah-lied)

44.speaker: Wyll
44.text: I reckon Dror Ragzlin's the gobbo in charge, the way this one's carrying on.

35.speaker: Gribbo
35.context: NodeContext: Common is a language - can't believe she's having to explain this

14.speaker: Volo
14.text: Quite so. Now if you'll excuse me.
14.context: NodeContext: trying to smooth things over during an argument

24.speaker: Gribbo
24.text: Whozzat? Friend o' yours? You up to somethin'?
24.context: NodeContext: talking to Volo rather than the player - confused, thinks there's a scheme going on

53.speaker: Volo
53.context: NodeContext: a loudly whispered aside to the player while under duress

54.speaker: Volo
54.context: NodeContext: trying to get his bearings after being interrupted on stage

36.speaker: Gribbo
36.text: Wait a tick. That a friend o' yours?

25.speaker: Volo
25.context: NodeContext: indignant - trying to smooth over an argument

11.speaker: Volo
11.text: No! I mean, I... we've met, but only for the briefest of consultations.
11.context: NodeContext: trying to smooth over an argument by insisting he doesn't know the player well

5.speaker: Volo
5.text: (What are you doing? I'm busy here!)

7.speaker: Volo
7.context: NodeContext: trying to distract from an argument

9.speaker: Volo
9.text: Ahem. 'Dror Ragzlin, Dror Ragzlin, we, erm...'
9.context: NodeContext: attempting to return to his improvised song - projecting voice uncertainly on and after Dror Ragzlin (Drawer RAGS-lin

30.speaker: Volo
30.text: I, erm... 'Dror Ragzlin, umtumptous, Dror Ragzlin, erm...'
30.context: NodeContext: attempting to return to his improvised song - projecting voice uncertainly on and after Dror Ragzlin (Drawer RAGS-lin

34.speaker: Volo
34.text: Wait! Wait! 'Dror Ragzlin, we... pray... we...'
34.context: NodeContext: attempting to return to his improvised song - projecting voice uncertainly on and after Dror Ragzlin (Drawer RAGS-lin

0.speaker: Volo
0.context: NodeContext: a loudly whispered aside, angry

22.speaker: Gribbo
22.text: C'mon, pigeon. Back to your cage.
22.context: NodeContext: the 'pigeon' is Volo, a captive human. Annoyed

19.speaker: Player
19.text: Continue rhyming. 'For a soul's not been truer than the Ragzlin named Dror...'

2.speaker: Gribbo
2.text: Huh. That was good, carry it on, pigeon.

43.speaker: Volo
43.text: Um... Hah... '... And if you saw him kill manlings, you'd have to yell...' ahem... 'proooaaaar!'

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Is that really the best you can do?

46.speaker: Player
46.text: 'I heard Ragzlin casts shadows that are 20 leagues wide!'

3.speaker: Volo
3.text: Um... 'Why...' Err... 'He's a meatier creature than any I've spied!' Oh, balderdash...

1.speaker: Gribbo
1.text: Oi, stranger, you meddlin' with my pigeon? He's talking stupid now.
